articles.description: The ASX 200 shifted between narrow losses and gains on Wednesday, finishing just 0.1% ahead at 6686.6. The banks improved as the session wore on while Telstra gained 2.7%.
articles.content:
Commonwealth Bank, NAB, Westpac and ANZ recovered from a weak start to drag the market higher, while energy stocks resumed their rollicking rally on the back of improved oil prices.
